byline.original: By MAHER SATTAR and GEETA ANAND

abstract: Amnesty International asks Bangladeshi government to clarify whereabouts of Hasnat Karim, British citizen who survived hostage crisis inside Dhaka restaurant on July 1 and has been missing since being detained by police for questioning.

headline.main: Two Hostages From Bangladesh Standoff Are Still Missing

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Amnesty International urged the government to clarify the whereabouts of one of the men, who were questioned after surviving a terrorist attack on a Dhaka restaurant....
lead_paragraph: Amnesty International urged the government to clarify the whereabouts of one of the men, who were questioned after surviving a terrorist attack on a Dhaka restaurant.
